archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1462
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Foundation Manager, I want to discount eligible end users plans (i.e. community services card holders) and have the ability to charge the difference to another party (i.e. MSD)

properties.value: Some part of the costs should be redirected to Ministry of Social Development. MSD in this case is a foundation partner, but the eligible end users are separate customers (not accounts under MSD), which are not managed by MSD

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
